Jiu-JitsuVSTheWorld.name: Jiu-Jitsu VS The World
Jiu-JitsuVSTheWorld.summary: A film about Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and the positive effects it has on people.

ROLLJiu-JitsuInSoCal.name: ROLL: Jiu-Jitsu in SoCal
ROLLJiu-JitsuInSoCal.summary: A documentary we put together following a short trip to California in late 2014. We met some amazing and inspiring people in the short time that we were there and this film is a slight glimpse into the Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu lifestyle in Southern California.

THENOMADCHRONICLESTHEHANDOFGOD[DOCUMENTA.name: THE NO-MAD CHRONICLES: THE HAND OF GOD [DOCUMENTARY]
THENOMADCHRONICLESTHEHANDOFGOD[DOCUMENTA.summary: "THE HAND OF GOD" documentary is telling the inspirational life story of a kid who was born without four fingers on his left hand and managed to become a multiple times world Brazilian jiu-jitsu champion.
